input.sentences: have you ever just stepped outside and let the stress of real life vanish for a few moments ?
to enjoy the scenery and sunshine of nature . . . no stresses of work or deadlines .
life is beautiful but sometimes we get blinded by things that are n't important in the long run .
as long as you try your best | there will be a rainbow at the end of the stream .
life might not always be easy | but if you take a deep breath and just breathe ... everything will be just fine .
output.sentences: It was so huge and beautiful.
My pictures from the car turned out blurry especially because of the rain.
Finally the sun came out and shone over the rocks and water.
The waterfalls were a site to behold.
